general_summary: You've made a good start on your session! We noticed some significant instability in your right ankle during the movement. Focusing on improving your ankle stability will build a much stronger and safer foundation for all your exercises.

remedial_plan.name: Single-Leg Balance
remedial_plan.prescription: Perform 3 sets of 30 seconds per leg. Focus on maintaining a still and balanced position.
remedial_plan.adaptive_reasoning: This exercise directly targets the small muscles surrounding your ankle, enhancing proprioception and strengthening the stabilizers. This is crucial for developing a solid, stable base for all your movements, addressing the right ankle acceleration issue.

timeline_events.detailed_explanation: Your right ankle accelerated significantly more than it should, indicating instability. Focus on rooting your feet firmly into the ground to create a solid, stable foundation for your movements.
